Let me begin by expressing my desire to secure the most affordable rate for the 50 square meter, one-bedroom apartment in the city center. In the negotiation, I'll strive to achieve the lowest possible price, sticking only to this aspect and not touching upon additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. 

In a hypothetical scenario, if we were to reach an agreement on a specific price, I would simulate acceptance with the sentence, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' However, if the negotiation were to end without a price consensus, the simulation would conclude with both 'TERMINATE' messages. 

In this ongoing text exchange, I'm merely engaging in a roleplay, as I'm not physically present to negotiate a real-life rental.
